author: a42
title: He returns! Not very differently.
review:
I picked this up for 12 Euro in Smyths. At first, I wanted to get splitface instead, now, I still do.

Pros

  • If you don't have the original mask, good.
  • Cool handcuffs.
  • Printed torso!
  • Sleek ball-shooter.
  • Cool proppellers.
  • Coulor scheme: Red, silver, white.
  • Cool Tubes.

Cons

  • If you do have the original mask, bad.
  • How is he going to attach those handcuffs to a shark?
  • A hand could fit into the ball shooter, but they used a bionicle hand instead.
  • The propellers seriously hinder head movement.
  • Why the white parts?
  • Back STILL unarmoured.

Overall, an allright set. if it's on sale, and you can get it cheap, like I did, do it.

author: happysquid
title: the worst furno ever
review:
this set is the worst hero factory set made and is not worth the Â£10 i graced the shop for it

Pros

  • parts (some of them)

Cons

  • no melee weapon
  • stupid colour scheme
  • a spear and 2 robot hands on a gun as a "special weapon"
  • bad value for money

in conclusion i strongly advise you to NOT BUY THIS SET

and to use your money for a set like bulk or core hunter or voltix.

author: Lootatoo
title: FURNO : he could fly!
review:
One of the best hero

Box/Instructions

He comes in a bag type, reducting space on shipping, although the canister thing is nice to have afterall. Anyway reducting space is a ecofriendly initiative from LEGO, maybe.


Parts

Several ones, almost the double as heros commonly have. 

The turbines or fans gives Furno a unique view.

The silver ball has a nice texture formed by ABS mix when liquid.

The build

Nothing new, very good and nice as usual, fast build indeed.
Only the pipes for the fans are a new thing as the turbines too.

The completed model

Furno is a very balanced designed one, I mean it's size, the size of the shells and head works well. The colors are nice too.

Summary

For Hero Factory fans this one is a must have!

author: Curt1234
title: A decent set.
review:
This set came in the mail recently. I'm impressed. Cue the pros and cons!

Pros to buying this set:

— Nice parts.

This set has really nice parts, like the fans and hoses. 

Cons to buying this set:

— Poor playability.

This set has very poor playability. The head can hardly move due to the fan apparatuses. 

This set overall is nice, but it is hard to play with... It's very good for Mocs, however.
